page.title: 04A SCHOOLBOY'S DAY,SOUTH FEN
page.content: This report is about James Laud,an eleven year old boy,who lives in}South Fen,near Bourne in South Lincs. His father owns a scrapyard and foundry. It covers a normal school day in his life which starts when he gets up at 6:45.After washing and dressing he spends much time before breakfast cleaning and polishing his motorbike, an 80cc Yamaha. At about 8:00 he has his breakfast and at 8:30 has to leave for school.All the chidren that live in and around Tongue End have to go to school in a mini_bus.They arrive at about a quarter to nine. After school James leaves on the mini_bus at 3:35 and goes to the scrap yard where he helps his father make moulds for drain lids.Tea follows at 6 after which he rides his bike for an hour,followed by television after a bath until bedtime,which comes at 9pm.
